title: Ground
description: The main ground layer, where the background is put, such as grass, or water etc.

title: Layer 2
description: This is the layer where tiles that are above the ground are placed, such as tree bases, bridges, etc.

title: Layer 3
description: This is the main decorations layer, where barrels, snowmen, chests, boats, wells and other things can rest against trees and houses.

title: Foreground
description: This is the layer for all the tiles that are above the player, such as tree tops, house tops, walls, and other stuff.

title: Collision
description: This is the layer that objects are put on, ones that the player will collide with.
